PROVIDERS_PROFILE.OfferVisibility:
Offer's visibility for clients.
Public offers are shown in the list of available offers for followers while they register a subscription.
Private offers are hidden from this list and available only via join links.

PROVIDERS_PROFILE.Delete Shared Link Main Description: Do you really want to delete the shared link? The shared profile will no longer be available publicly through this link. This action is irreversible.
